description: Vulnerability in the Oracle User Management product of Oracle E-Business Suite (component: Search and Register Users).  Supported versions that are affected are 12.2.4-12.2.14. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Oracle User Management.  Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in  unauthorized access to critical data or complete access to all Oracle User Management accessible data. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 7.5 (Confidentiality impacts).  CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:N/A:N).
